class Up():
    test_cases=int(raw_input())
    arr=[]
    count=0
    for i in range(test_cases):
        arr2=[]
        leng=int(raw_input())
        arr3=[0]*leng
        s=(raw_input().split())
        for i in s:
            arr2.append(int(i))
        arr2.sort()
        c=0
        for i in range(0,leng,2):
            arr3[i]=arr2[c]
            c=c+1
        for j in range(1,leng,2):
            arr3[j]=arr2[c]
            c=c+1
        for k in arr3:    
            print k,
        print
